com.sap.runlet.operationaltransformation
Interface Operation<S>

Type Parameters:
S - the class that models the state, on instances of which operations perform changes
All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractOperation
public interface Operation<S>
extends java.lang.Cloneable

A change operation can be applied to some start state of some universe and transforms that universe into a target state.

Method Summary
 S applyTo(S toState)
          Applies this operation to the state toState, producing a new target state which is returned.
 Operation<S> clone()
           
 

Method Detail

applyTo

S applyTo(S toState)
Applies this operation to the state toState, producing a new target state which is returned.

Parameters:
toState - the state to which to apply this operation
Returns:
the state produced by applying this operation to toState
